common.signUpNow: Sign up now and buy NFTs!
common.downloadPhantom: Download Phantom, buy Solana (SOL) and mint your first NFT - quick and easy!
common.setupPhantom: Set up your Phantom Wallet quickly - either on your phone or PC, and start your crypto adventure safely.
common.buySolanaDesc: Acquire Solana (SOL) through exchanges and transfer them to your Phantom Wallet.
common.mintNftsDesc: Choose your preferred NFT collection and mint your first NFT directly in the wallet.
common.generateIncomeDesc: Use your NFTs to generate passive income through our casino and lottery system.
common.profitShareDesc: You receive a monthly share of LunaCasino's net profits - proportionally according to NFT value.
common.lotteryTicketsDesc: Every month you get new tickets for LunaLotto - free to mint.
common.streamlinePowerDesc: From $500 you are in the global leaderboard for Leader-Rewards.
common.exclusiveAccessDesc: VIP access to beta phases, events, airdrops and more.
common.valueDevelopmentDesc: Your NFTs are tradable on the Solana marketplace after the sale is completed - limited & deflationary.
common.lunaLottoAndCasino: LunaLotto and LunaCasino are innovative platforms that bring together the worlds of online gaming and blockchain technology.
